trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Lakeland
There were no other sightings in Lakeland on or around November 18th 2013
Summary: I was outside star gazing when what appeared to be a ufo was spotted.
divs: sighting detailsit was 7:52 p.m. in the city of lakeland, florida when the incident occurred. when the incident occurred i was outside of my apartment star gazing with my binoculars. the nighttime sky was clear of stars so i planned to come inside shortly. i then noticed as i was gazing over my apartment building out of the corner of the lens i saw a bright light. i instinctively turned the binoculars toward the light thinking it was a helicopter. i then saw a hovering oval shaped craft with a series of circular lights around the oval. i thought to myself "it's only a helicopter." i stood there and had a sense of fear instilled in me remembering earlier experiences i had had with the e.t. had they come back to get me? i watched as the craft stood still not moving an inch just hovering in the night time sky. the craft omitted orange\red lights. i then quickly ran inside in fear of my life.
